comments:
Discovered by automatic nightly unit-testing:

Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
at java.lang.System.arraycopy(Native Method)
at java.util.ArrayList.toArray(ArrayList.java:304)
at org.eclipse.rse.internal.core.model.SystemHostPool.getHosts(SystemHostPool.java:268)
at org.eclipse.rse.ui.internal.model.SystemRegistry.getHostsByProfile(SystemRegistry.java:1420)
at org.eclipse.rse.ui.internal.model.SystemRegistry.getHosts(SystemRegistry.java:1402)
at org.eclipse.rse.ui.internal.model.SystemRegistry.getHostsBySystemType(SystemRegistry.java:1492)
at org.eclipse.rse.ui.internal.model.SystemRegistry.getLocalHost(SystemRegistry.java:1388)
at com.windriver.ide.target.ui.rse.connections.WRConnectionManager.getRegistrySubSystem(WRConnectionManager.java:281)
at com.windriver.ide.target.ui.rse.internal.elements.WRElementWrapperAdapter.getSubSystem(WRElementWrapperAdapter.java:109)
at org.eclipse.rse.ui.internal.model.SystemRegistry.isSameObjectByAbsoluteName(SystemRegistry.java:1067)
at org.eclipse.rse.internal.ui.view.ElementComparer.equals(ElementComparer.java:34)
at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CustomHashtable.keyEquals(CustomHashtable.java:277)
at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CustomHashtable.get(CustomHashtable.java:239)
at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.findItems(StructuredViewer.java:770)
at org.eclipse.rse.internal.ui.view.SystemView.mappedFindAllRemoteItemReferences(SystemView.java:4420)
at org.eclipse.rse.internal.ui.view.SystemView.findAllRemoteItemReferences(SystemView.java:4334)
at org.eclipse.rse.internal.ui.view.SystemView.smartRefresh(SystemView.java:3600)
at org.eclipse.rse.internal.ui.view.SystemView$ResourceChangedJob.runInUIThread(SystemView.java:2048)
at org.eclipse.ui.progress.UIJob$1.run(UIJob.java:94)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:35)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages(Synchronizer.java:123)

Quite definitely a threading problem in SystemHostPool. These have already been addressed, see bug 206742 comment 2. Please reopen when it happens again with an RSE version that includes these fixes.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 206742 ***
